channel.title: Posts on Stephen Caraher Portfolio Website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Stephen Caraher Portfolio Website

item.title: ANZ Virtual Internship - Banking Predictive Analytics
item.description: In this project I undertook exploratory data analysis to obtain key insights from transaction sample data for the Australia and New Zealand Banking Group (ANZ) as part of a Virtual Internship. I created linear regression and decision-tree models to predict salaries. The predictions were ~50% more accurate than the ANZ model solution. (Click project titles to access each project page).

item.title: Quantium Virtual Internship - Retail Performance Analytics
item.description: In this project I undertook data preparation, customer analytics, experimentation, uplift testing and performance analytics on a large dataset for a major retailer as part of my Virtual Internship Experience with Quantium. I used the insights to derive a commercial strategy for the retail manager.

item.title: European Football Club Points
item.description: In this project I used linear, lasso and random forest regression machine learning models to predict the final points totals of European football clubs, based on projected performance metrics.

item.title: Traffic Sign Classifier
item.description: I developed a nueral network with deep learning using Python and Keras to recognise and classify different images of traffic signs with an accuracy of 98%.

item.title: Predicting House Prices
item.description: In this project I created and optimised a gradient boosted machine learning model to predict house prices in Iowa for submission to a Kaggle.com competition. My submission is in the top 7% of submissions globally (as of 05/09/2020).

item.title: Titanic Survivors
item.description: In this project I used exploratory data analysis to identify key characteristics of Titanic survivers and used classification machine learning models to predict what type of person was more likely to survive.
